TypeSignature.Value: .class public sealed serializable HttpContinueDelegate extends System.Delegate
public delegate void HttpContinueDelegate(int StatusCode, WebHeaderCollection httpHeaders);
.class public auto ansi sealed HttpContinueDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A containing the numeric value of the HTTP status from the server.
A containing the headers returned with the response.

summary.para: Defines the shape of methods that are invoked when a response is received by a web client.

remarks.para: Use a instance to specify the methods that are automatically invoked whenever HTTP 100 ( ) responses are received from a web server.
